mapper.select: SELECT g.`group_id`, g.`group_name`, p.`plan_name`, p.`budget` FROM t_group g JOIN t_plan p ON p.`plan_id` = g.`plan_id`

SELECT g.`group_id` groupId, g.`group_name` groupName, p.`plan_name` planName, p.`budget` budget, c.`channel_id` channelId, c.`price` price FROM t_group g JOIN t_group_channel c ON c.`group_id` = g.`group_id` JOIN t_plan p ON p.`plan_id` = g.`plan_id` WHERE g.`group_name` = #{groupName} AND c.`channel_id` = #{channelId}
